amendment.description: Amendment adds language commending the Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization for their declaration of support of the Global War on Terrorism and for strengthening their efforts to combat and prevent terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18A and made in order pursuant to section 2 of H. Res.365 (as passed by the House) to insert a new section in the bill titled "Declaration of Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Lantos.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
